title: PES U cutoffs question
content: Asking in place of a friend. He got a rank of 670, does he have any chance of getting CS at RR in the second round of counseling? I think the cutoff was 660 in the ist round.

comments.body: whys that? doesnt he just need a few ppl to pull out
surely  some ppl will leave after KCET/Mains results(probably BITS results)
Dont come hto pes you will regret

Its not worth it. Every thing is shit...college life, management, everything. Come only if you have no other option left. And remember, when people are saying placement is good, you should also know cse alone has more than 1000 students for placement. Only a fraction of them get good job.
